name: Shoes-set BOX - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: The Shoes-set BOX by Studio CC features American walnut veneer on poplar plywood. The interior is finished with Lebanese cedar and divided into compartments for optimal storage of shoe cleaning accessories. This product, embodying the craftsmanship and high-quality materials such as wood, leather, and metal, is designed with an understanding of luxury goods to highlight individuality and distinctiveness.
